price: 9. Haddaad (gaaladaa) weydiiso: Yaa abuuray samooyinka iyo arlada? Waxay odhan: Waxaa abuuray (Alle) Adkaadaha, Wax kasta Ogaha ah.
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ خَلَقَهُنَّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunna khalaqahunna al-ʿazīzu al-ʿalīmu
